AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hunted child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When [PAWN_nameDef] was a child, [PAWN_possessive] father killed the son of an influential mob boss. [PAWN_nameDef]'s family was murdered by thugs, but [PAWN_pronoun] managed to escape. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] early years running from the mob, before [PAWN_pronoun] could find a way off-world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: brittle-bones
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is very prone to injury, especially for a skellin. Many of [PAWN_possessive] early days were spent in a cast.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: child gunsmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a rimworld. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed more than firing guns was assembling guns. While [PAWN_pronoun] had no problem firing a gun, [PAWN_nameDef] couldn't bare visiting the colony's triage, knowing that [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in making devices to inflict suffering.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ranch stray
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born and raised on a RimWorld, [PAWN_nameDef] ran from home at a young age, and rode off to a nearby ranch. The ranch boss took a liking to [PAWN_objective], and allowed [PAWN_objective] to stay, as long as [PAWN_pronoun] worked for [PAWN_possessive] keep.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: abandoned merc
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was hired to kill a target. [PAWN_pronoun] was shuttled to a remote cabin, but soon realized that nobody was inside. [PAWN_pronoun] then realized that [PAWN_pronoun] had been double-crossed, as the shuttle took off without [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farmhand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was never really any good with a gun. This landed [PAWN_pronoun] a job as a farmhand. This turned out to be [PAWN_nameDef]'s calling.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: melee enthusiast
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] insists on using melee weapons, despite being at a physiological disadvantage.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bedridden colonist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a rim colony. One day, an insane colonist went berserk, and shattered [PAWN_possessive] spine with a club. [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days in the hospital, unable to move. [PAWN_pronoun] stayed positive, however, and other colonists enjoyed visiting [PAWN_objective] just to chat. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually received a donor spine, after the same insane colonist tried his luck against the colony's best brawler.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: jealous lover
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to frequent a bar, where [PAWN_pronoun] entered a relationship with an attractive server. Alas, [PAWN_possessive] lover had a flirting nature, and [PAWN_nameDef] was jealous of looks from other patrons. One day, [PAWN_nameDef] became so angry, [PAWN_pronoun] challenged a stranger to a duel. [PAWN_possessive] lover was killed in the crossfire, and [PAWN_nameDef] fled, swearing never to love again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: sundown shooter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled between settlements, challenging popular figures to shootouts. Obviously, [PAWN_pronoun] always won. The reason: [PAWN_nameDef] only fought with [PAWN_possessive] back to the sunset.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: paste innovator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a young adult, [PAWN_nameDef] got [PAWN_possessive] first taste of nutrient paste. [PAWN_pronoun] hated it. However, [PAWN_pronoun] saw the potential, considering the fact that [PAWN_pronoun] nearly starved before the base's paste dispenser was introduced. [PAWN_pronoun] set out to create a better paste dispenser, and soon became a social outcast because of all the terrible glop [PAWN_pronoun] tested on [PAWN_possessive] fellow townsfolk.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: retired merc
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in a gang of contract mercenaries. [PAWN_possessive] crew was tasked with taking out a small settlement. As they approached, [PAWN_pronoun] was feeling confident about the job, before a manic spray from a minigun dropped all of [PAWN_possessive] colleagues at once, prompting [PAWN_pronoun] to run. It was at this moment that [PAWN_nameDef] decided to take a break from [PAWN_possessive] contract-killing gig.
